long_description: the g2 group is a multidisciplinary design and construction company based in somerset west, western cape. this passionate team can deliver projects over a broad range of design and construction activities, offering a start-to-end solution striking the delicate balance between function and form that is evident in our projects completed. we are dedicated to working within budget requirements without any compromise to the project quality. the g2 team offers you over 4 decades worth of experience and our clients are assured of passion, precision, dedication and expertise every step of the way. gerhard has been in the construction industry for more than 20 years, with experience ranging from basic renovations, to r 500 million high rise developments. he offers you expert attendance and focus on quality and detail, with a vast technical knowledge to deliver any successful project. gerda has been in the design industry for more than 15 years, gaining experience internationally and nationally on hospitality, commercial, health care and residential projects.
generated_description: g2 group is a multidisciplinary design and construction company based in somerset west, western cape. the company offers a comprehensive range of services including commercial and residential construction, renovations, architectural and interior design, and project management. with over four decades of experience, g2 group is dedicated to delivering projects that balance function and form while maintaining high standards of quality and detail. the team, led by experienced professionals such as gerhard geldenhuys and gerda geldenhuys, has completed numerous successful projects, including luxury residential developments and sophisticated office interiors.
